description: The FMX token is the native cryptocurrency of the Foodmex Delivery Services platform, designed to facilitate seamless transactions and interactions within our ecosystem. It serves as a means of payment for food orders, unlocking rewards, discounts, and exclusive benefits for our users. Additionally, FMX token holders have the power to participate in platform governance, influencing decisions related to its development and growth. With its utility and community-driven approach, the FMX token is at the core of our mission to revolutionize the food delivery industry.
